Reviews.Title: “Good Location Tired Rooms”
Reviews.Author: Hendro_43
Reviews.Content: Stayed there for our Wedding Anniversary with our kids. Location was great, walking distance from Orchard Road, easy also to hail cabs. Rooms a little tired though, not a new Hotel obviously. Check-in staff attentive, rest of the staff not sure what they do, bell hop was good. Pool towels were few and far between, maybe pool is not the centre piece of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Dated...but good location”
Reviews.Author: cutie_apple
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights. We found the hotel very dated. Hotel seems to cater for Asian tourist. Our room included breakfast, and it had wide selection east meets west. The hotel is located thin 5 minutes walk to newton shopping mall which was good and has a MRT NEXT A skip and hop away to the rest of Singapore. Singapore hotels are becoming increasingly expensive. So for those who are on a budget as hotel on orchard road is VERY expensive. This may be a reasonable choice ad you do get what you paid for.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Heather R
Reviews.Content: Hotel is in good location, not too far to walk to nearest MRT station. Room was more than adequate, and hotel had everything we needed. Check in was a little bit slow, but we got a free drinks voucher because of this. Breakfast was excellent, great variety and more than enough to fill you up until lunchtime. Restaurant was also good for other meals, good quality and ok value for money. Swimming pool was not exactly appealing which was a bit of a shame as the humidity meant we often fancied a refreshing dip.

Reviews.Title: “not so royal”
Reviews.Author: GordonT
Reviews.Content: I should have known better and looked on TA before getting our travel agent to book.. Good location for my 1 night stay and an early business meeting but,,, Checkin - slow but hey I can get over that Room - thrwadbare sheets that you could readthe mattress label through, stains and burns pn thread bare carpets, mould on thh bathroom wall tiles, ceiling and door. Restaurant - after the cleanliness of the room I played it safe and had a coffee!

Reviews.Title: “Good location but .....”
Reviews.Author: imax_12
Reviews.Content: We book this hotel through agoda, we stayed there for 7 nights spending our holiday vacation, the front desk is very slow and seems not interested with their guest. Upon check in, we thought of their good deeds by upgrading our room from family room to suite but we found out the we were given room 501, very old room, dusty, big spaces yes, furniture are old, curtains are dirty , carpets are retiring, staying there for 1 hour, my kids suffer asthma attacks and allergy already. we demanded a new room but we were given a room night time already, we transferred to 8th floor, we though everything will be ok, the room is so so ,but still not clean, dusty , and there is a smell which we dont know where coming from, so we stayed there for almost 3 nights but we were wondering why my kids keeps on coughing and having stuffy nose especially whenever the aircondition is turned on. Again, we discovered that they have transferred us to smoking floor , I did not know why these stupid people transfered me to a smoking room since my primary reason is allergies and dust besides, i have requested first hand that a non smoking room for us, also it is also logical since we have 2 kids around, cant really imagine what they have done. I demanded again for transfer, they transfered us to non smoking floor, though the room is still the same but a little improvement in the carpets, but the air surrounding the floor and airconditioned is have improve so much than before. I ask them, why the front desk have transfered us to a smoking room, as usual they cannot provide a straight answer. Internet acces also is very expensive, you need to buy a wifi card which you can use continously only which i think is not reasonable. Food is not ok also the breakfast is not good. One good points here is only the good location but the rest is dissapointing. Also, i remember that bed covers and bed sheeets have blood stains. If im going to rate this hotel which 5 is the highest , i think its 2. Hope this review will help other people.

Reviews.Title: “Budget hotel below 3 star”
Reviews.Author: Aidanaj
Reviews.Content: It's 3 star but cant expect too much with the monies we are paying. I checked in late evening and front desk is very slow and full of foreigner staff. Room are okayed but seriously needs refurbish. Pillows full on stains, they don't even provide bottle drinking water. So be prepare to buy your own, but did not notice lots of convenient staff nearby. Breakfast are as what it should be, western style coffee, eggs station to cater your style. Very convenient .. About 5 minutes walks to MRT Novena station on on the way you can find Burger King for supper is you wish. By the way no free Wifi . Overall it's within expectation over the price we are paying.

Reviews.Title: “An OK stay in an expensive city”
Reviews.Author: Dee V
Reviews.Content: It was relatively a mid-range hotel in terms of hotel cost. The interiors need some sprucing up because it is rather loud with too much going on (gold chinese lettering, a loud fountain etc.) The rooms were OK. The lobby area had a funny smell which was probably emitting from the "Rickshaw coffee shop" where a lot of Chinese/Singaporean food was prepared (sesame oil?). We were pleasantly surprised that the breakfast was very tasty although the presentation was mediocre. The parata and pancakes were delicious though the bacon was overdone both days. The best was when they prepared sweet and sour prawns and rice at around 11.30 in the night after a long day of sight seeing. The reception has its moments, with one attendant being very helpful while one or two attendees being too preoccupied or ignoring us until we got their attention. Also one attendant refused to take ownership when we got locked out of the room since we missed the check out time. I had to go back twice to make sure the locking card/key worked since she bungled it up the first time. Overall, the Rickshaw restaurant was a good start to a day and a quick snack but I recommend eating out like most of the city folk do. I might come back since its SO NEAR to all the MRT stations, buses and just short distances from main attractions which helps in saving money on traveling to spend it on more interesting ventures while in Singapore!

Reviews.Title: “At the Heart of Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Basu123
Reviews.Content: Located right in the heart of Singapore's business area and is only minutes away from the renowned shopping and entertainment centre of Orchard Road. Can be reached in 30 minutes from Changi Airport and comfotable walking distance from Novena MRT Station. Well, the hotel has all facilities a leisure traveler needs at a very reasonable price. The hotel caters nice resturants with room service, 24 hr. TV channels, Wi-Fi Internet Connectivity, ample car parking space. The hotel is liked by both tourist and business travellers.

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't stay here again”
Reviews.Author: tdbt1016
Reviews.Content: I am so glad we only stayed here for 1 night for a layover on our way back to the States from Bali, 2 weeks ago, during Formula One weekend. The reception area is average - nothing to get excited about. The receptionist warned us about potential noise issue that we would experience due to on going construction & pipe-fixing from the 16th floor & up. We didn't experience too much of a noise problem though, so that was good. We asked for a non-smoking room, and upon entering it, we could tell that people have chained smoked in there before - it reeked. The room just had an old, smelly & dirty feel to it. The beds in the room (which was 2 twin beds) should've been chucked out a long time ago. The mattress was so thin, we literally had springs poking though our backs. We had to pile up all the linens we could find on top of one bed, to provide some cushion & my husband & I slept on 1 twin bed. Bathroom was ok, working, which was a good sign for us. The only good thing i could say about this place is its close proximity to a train station - that's it. I would never book another stay here again, i think a Motel 6 in the US actually has better standards than this.

Reviews.Title: “Good Stay, Courteous Staff .. but far from Mustfa”
Reviews.Author: Shakti09
Reviews.Content: I went to Singapore during Ist week of July 2011 and enjoyed stay at Hotel Royal Newton with my family. The Hotel is situated at Novino. Staff especially Miss Grace and the lady Manager Revenue were very courteous. Only a few points need to be improved: 1. Separate arrangement for pure Vegetarian people. 2. Security should not be taken from visitors who have prepaid vouchers obtained from Travel Agents. It is not being taken in other Hotels like Vistana (4 Star) in Malaysia where we have stayed. In case the security is taken by way of blockage of SGD200 from Shopping Cards, it should promptly be unblocked on departure and clearance by the visitors. 3. Since the Hotel is at some distance from Mustaffa etc. popular shoppings, hotel should run free shuttle service for its guests to Mustaffa. On the whole the experience is nice, I recommend stay at Hotel Royal at Newton. Shakti Kumar Jain skjonline@gmail.com Chandigarh, India, 25-Aug 2011.

Reviews.Title: “Acceptable for a short visit , close to hot spot areas such as Ochard Road”
Reviews.Author: MakadiBay
Reviews.Content: The hotel is above average 7/10. Near from hot spot areas such as Orchard Road 5 min walk from the nearest Metro station **Novena** The breakfast is good and a lot of varieties. The room is good , clean . The reception area is poor and need to be upgraded . The service is good and the front desk employees are so helpful and supportive. Recommended for a short visit . People who look for luxurious hotel , this is not your place. In general , i don't have any problem to return back and stay in this hotel as i didn't face any bad experience there.. Regards;

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: Emme257
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 2 nights with my husband and son. The location is a walking distance to United Square, Novena Square and Velocity. Taxi is easily accessible in front of the hotel. The room is equipped with ironing board and iron which is really handy. The minibar is useful to me as I use it to store milk. We had a comfy sleep, even my baby had a good rest. The room is clean, no complain on that. The only downside is that the internet is payable, quite expensive. I'd definitely stay here again especially because it's close to United Square.

Reviews.Title: “easy access”
Reviews.Author: esenesem
Reviews.Content: hotel rooms were comfortable, price reasonable, breakfast provided but very limited choices for muslims. however , it is a walking distance to norvena mrt and some of the food outlet in the mall are halal. would not mind to stay there again. swimming pool tho small but just nice for beginner like me

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing, needs a serious makeover.”
Reviews.Author: Sarah0312
Reviews.Content: Not a great first impression! No bell boy to take our luggage on arrival. Check in took ages and not the best service I've received at all. Upon entering our room my face dropped, and I have to be honest I actually cried. I had been looking forward to the Singapore leg of our trip for so long and we booked this hotel as it was cheaper than others on offer. It wasn't cheap enough! Where do I begin? The furniture in the room was dusty, the carpet had big lumps of fluff on it, the shower was warm and worked ok but the shower head and rail were rusty and in need of replacement. The TV was a modern flat screen and worked fine, but this was the most modern thing in the room. The bed was hard but we both slept alright...probably out of tiredness more than anything rather than the quality of the bed. The sheets and brown scratchy blanket were off putting. The main concern in the bedroom must have been the air con - it was actually dripping water out of it! Not good, although I'm ashamed to say we didn't report this at the time. One night we were so hungry we ordered room service - a cheese sandwich and fries. It was brought to the room within 15 minutes of ordering and wasn't too bad...plus it was cheap. The location was OK - a short walk from Novena MRT station. We have definitely learnt our lesson - don't book a hotel just because of its price. The price we paid wasn't even good value for money! I would rather pay more for a better standard of room.

Reviews.Title: “Nightmare”
Reviews.Author: jmk10ho
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel in June 2010 for 3 nights. Location is great - just 5 minutes walk to Novena MRT station - the only reason why we picked this hotel. Hotel room was old but quite big. At first I was happy for getting such a big hotel room. But nightmare happened on the first night. I woke up in the middle of the night because of the noise and light from the TV. My roommate was fast asleep so I turned if off using the remote. The TV turned on ON ITS OWN. I turned it off again using the remote but it turned on again. I repeated again and the same thing happened. Eventually I got so pissed off that I walked towards the TV and unplugged it. I wasn't even scared at that moment (I was very sleepy) but it scared the heck out of me when I talked to my roommate about it on the next morning. On the second and third nights we heard people singing karaoke until 1 or 2 am. When we checked out on the fourth day I complained to the front desk. The lady said it's because of the karaoke lounge upstairs. Later on we talked to our coworkers who were staying upstairs (14/F) - they said they had heard nothing throughout the night. The cleaning staff didn't replace the towels on the second day. The towels were all taken and my roommate had no towel for shower. Took 10 minutes for housekeeping to get us some new towels. Overall speaking, avoid this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Would never use again”
Reviews.Author: claraspar
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the royal at Newton for two nights as a stopover on our return from Australia. Sadly, as much as I love Singapore, this hotel spoiled our trip for us. The hotel itself is dated (1970's) and the rooms are shabby. The electrics in the room border on life threatening, I would not let my daughter touch any switches at all in the room. The bathrooms were clean but again, very dated. Couldn't use the shower as it wouldn't stay on the wall when turned on. Breakfast was plentiful, but the food was aimed largely at the asian palate, with a minimal choice for westerners. In conclusion, I would suggest you think twice before booking this hotel, it's not the cheapest hotel in Singapore, and pound for pound not worth spending good money on

Reviews.Title: “Avoid this place at all costs, A tent is better than this”
Reviews.Author: scott167
Reviews.Content: This Hotel is worn, old fashioned, uncomfortable with some of the worst staff I have ever met in a hotel - ask them something they either ignore you or hide.The place is very shabby, 3 or 4 English TV channels - Internet has to be paid for 8.5 SD per hour and if you log of it still expires in an hour - try to charge for filling up items not even in the room fridge - mattress broken, cigarette holes in the sheets - the Restaurant is filthy - I cannot believe how bad this is - avoid at all costs

Reviews.Title: “AVOID AT ALL COST”
Reviews.Author: intlman1
Reviews.Content: Really a disappointment. No bellman to take bags on arrival. Arrogant front desk staff. Restaurant staff not worthy of a tip. Would rather talk among themselves than provide service. Room was not the cleanest. Towels in bathroom were thin and had holes. Aircon did not work well. Check out was prolonged.

Reviews.Title: “great location, but moldy smell in the room”
Reviews.Author: linusbon
Reviews.Content: I stayed there for 10 days during a business trip. The hotel is 5-minute walking distance to a Newton MRT station, which is located in a shopping mall with many restaurants and a big food court, so the location is great. Although the room is spacious, there is a moldy smell that is pretty strong. I called the front desk to complain and the housekeeper kept the AC on whole day and it did help a bit. The buffet breakfast is okay with variety of fruit and a omelet station.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel for the price & great Location”
Reviews.Author: Angie662228
Reviews.Content: Was a little concerned after booking as some people had slated this hotel. We found it very nice,not luxury, but for the price (which included breakfast) it was excellent. We used the Newton MRT & it is literally a 2 minute walk away, nice shops at the station,good value Supermarket on the lower ground floor,coffee shops, Harry's Bar etc. & there are more shops inc Starbucks & department stores across the road. A convenient under paths takes you to each side rather than trying to cross the busy road. Its in a residential area so very quiet. City Hall & Orchard & 2 stops away, so your right in the centre in seconds. We were visiting our Son who is working over there for a couple of years & had been out there a few months, he was impressed with the Hotel & its excellent location. Would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous mobility options”
Reviews.Author: UrbanNomad11
Reviews.Content: We were welcomed with loads of luggage in the reception area tied with a red rope!! No place to sit down while my sister was checking in.The reception area was very noisy and understaffed,which only added to the chaos. The room was quite nice except for the air conditioning which got loud at times. The room was cleaned despite an active DND and when asked the housekeeping staff denied an active DND. The breakfast is good value for money,but getting a table seemed a bit like playing musical chairs.No empty tables in sight when I went to get myself some tea,cause someone had occupied mine. Over the course of the stay we realized that getting for breakfast before 8 or after 10 was the best option. The best bit about the hotel is the bus stop and taxi stand right outside the hotel and the MRT station(Novena) about a 4 minute walk making travelling in Singapore easy! The staff were courteous and allowed us a late check out at 5PM,otherwise 12noon! The swimming pool was shut for renovation though.

Reviews.Title: “Nightmarish experience in a terrible and unfriendly hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: Yathiri
Reviews.Content: Hotel Royal, Newton Road, Singapore June ,2010 We booked this hotel online for our family stay. They charged exorbitant rates. Until we checked in the staff seemed to be cordial...however the nightmare started thereafter!! The towels in the toilet were old , torn and in shreds. The room service was poor and the staff were unfriendly and rude. When compared to other hotels which offer free buffet breakfast and welcome drink, even water bottles are charged here. The staff at the front office and at the lobby were unprofessional. Overall the stay was unpleasant. It did not live upto its star-status that the hotel holds.This hotel is not suitable for leisure stay as it is far away from the airport and other touristic places in the city.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: ninbrisbane
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Royal Newton for 5 days, absolutely loved it. Perfect Location, room was nice, clean and comfortable. Tour Desk Operator was excellent and very helpful. Breakfast was nice. Staff were very helpful and nice. Kid's loved the swimming pool. Would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Good location.”
Reviews.Author: elsa66
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is Ok. Very Good location near "Novena"underground station, the breakfast is poor.

Reviews.Title: “comfy”
Reviews.Author: AustraliaParu
Reviews.Content: Rm not ready on arrival. was given an upgraded rm was worth waiting for.Staff apologetic & friendly, was given complimentary drink for the delay.I think breakfast should be made optinonal. Breakfast lacks taste. Walking distance from the hotel is the Newton Square or Velocity shopping centre where one can indulge in gourmet food or food galore for sml SGD. Ideal location.Gateway for shopping spree.

Reviews.Title: “Good but could have been better”
Reviews.Author: k1deiva
Reviews.Content: I booked the hotel through a known website with reputation, the hotel is in a strategic location, MRT nearby and not far from Orchard Road. However, the room itself is just average. It had a strange smell, not sure why but we did not bother much as we were away most of the time, we only got back at nights to sleep and some afternoons for a short nap. Breakfast was acceptable.

Reviews.Title: “spacious rooms..”
Reviews.Author: meeriah
Reviews.Content: we stayed in this hotel for 4 days and 3 nights last month, oct 25-28. was nice, very spacious room compared to most budgeted hotels especially if you're on a budget. the only thing though, the airconditioning unit needs a little service, either that or it's just the hot weather and the airconditioning cannot contain and keep the room cool all throughout the day. the location is great, totally accessible to the buses infact, the station is right infront of the hotel. taxis are also available 24/7. breakfast is also nice. will definitely stay there again if i will come to visit sg in the future.

Reviews.Title: “NICE AND BUDGETED PLACE”
Reviews.Author: CALLINGYOU
Reviews.Content: I STAYED at this place in april09.This place is far away from MRT Station.But Cab are quite easy to get its cost around 3SGD to go to chinatown.The Hotel itself is nice.I Got the deal for 200USD for 3nts/4Days Package.

HotelInfo.Name: Royal At Newton Hotel Singapore
HotelInfo.Address: 36 Newton Road, Singapore, Singapore
